casebody.data:
IN RE: J.L.T. and S.R.J.T. 244P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 24, 2017 Lisa Anne Wagner, Attorney at Law, for Hawkins, Amber Nicole. Anne C. Wright, Attorney at Law, Boone, for Triplett, Steven. Daniel S. Johnson, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Wilkes County DSS.

Amanda Armstrong, Attorney at Law, For GAL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of July 2017 by Petitioner for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of July 2017."
